patient_summary.condition: Likely a common viral upper respiratory infection, given the symptoms and recent contact with an ill person.

immediate_care.description: Prioritize rest to aid your body's recovery. Drink plenty of fluids like water, clear broths, and electrolyte drinks to prevent dehydration.
Use over-the-counter medications to manage symptoms as needed.  Focus on rest and allow your body's natural immune system to combat the illness.

medications.name: Acetaminophen (Tylenol)
medications.dosage: Follow product label directions for fever and pain relief.

medications.name: Saline Nasal Spray
medications.dosage: Use as directed on the product label

medications.name: Over-the-counter cough suppressant (dextromethorphan) or expectorant (guaifenesin)
medications.dosage: Follow product label directions. Consider using a cough suppressant for a dry cough and an expectorant for a productive cough.

lifestyle_recommendations.recommendation: Drink plenty of fluids such as water, clear broths, and herbal teas.
Get adequate rest to support your immune system's response.
Maintain a balanced diet to support overall health and recovery.  Continue your millet-based diet, ensuring it provides sufficient nutrients.

warning_signs.sign: Worsening shortness of breath or wheezing
warning_signs.action: Seek immediate medical attention if you experience shortness of breath or wheezing, especially given your history of asthma.

warning_signs.sign: High fever (over 101°F or 38.3°C) that persists for more than 3 days
warning_signs.action: Consult your doctor if you have a high fever that does not respond to treatment.
Contact your doctor if you experience severe or persistent pain.

follow_up.timeline: If symptoms worsen or persist beyond 7 days, or if you develop new symptoms.
follow_up.reason: To assess symptom progression and ensure appropriate management.

emergency_contacts.when_to_call: If you experience difficulty breathing, chest pain, or other severe symptoms.
For immediate medical attention outside of regular doctor's office hours.
